plot outline: Yamaleela is the story of Suraj, a careless and aimless young man. He comes to know that he hails from a royal family and how his mother raised him after his father's death and the loss of all their wealth. He struggles hard to get their lost wealth and Suvarna Palace back when he finds a magical future predicting book lost by Yama and Chitragupta from hell. A great comedy of errors follows.
title: Yamaleela
plot: _Yamaleela_ (qv) is the story of Suraj, a careless and aimless young man. He comes to know that he hails from a royal family and how his mother raised him after his father's death and the loss of all their wealth. He struggles hard to get their lost wealth and Suvarna Palace back when he finds a magical future predicting book lost by Yama and Chitragupta from hell. A great comedy of errors follows.
